result.notes:
One survey of Mounts Bay rMCZ site have been completed to date (Apr 2015):

Cruise: wgdn_0212

Date: 15th - 21st Mar 2012

Data collected:

MB Bathymetry Coverage (Contractor): 80% Coverage (CHP)

MB Backscatter Coverage (Contractor): 80% Coverage (CHP)

SS Coverage: None acquired to date

Video and Stills Samples to date: 11 video transects; 93 stills analysed

PSA Samples to date: 14

Infauna Samples to date: 14
